group_1.textCenter: (I should just leave this letter by her bed@and go back...)
Writing that felt so unnatural...@It was like my body was resisting every stroke.
(I have to admit I wasn't thinking clearly@back then.)
(I didn't mean to make Ui cry...)
(So I need to apologize and ask for@her forgiveness.)

group_1.textLeft: What the–?!

group_1.textRight: Touka? Is that really you?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-wh-what are YOU doing here?!

group_1.textRight: That's none of your business...
Why are you following me?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not following you! We just happen@to be walking in the same direction!

group_1.textRight: Your room isn't in this ward, though.

group_1.textLeft: Neither is yours!

group_1.textRight: I...need to go to Ui's room.

group_1.textLeft: But...I need to go there, too.

group_1.textRight: ...Unbelievable.
Are you actually thinking about apologizing@for what happened today?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, it looks I'm not the only one!
...Wait, you're gonna apologize, too?

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: Look, if you have something to say,@just spit it out!

group_1.textRight: ...I don't know what I should say, though.

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh?

group_1.textRight: I believed...I knew and understood@everything about Ui.
I was convinced I was the only person who@could make her happy.
But...I couldn't fathom what was truly fuelling@her excitement over the Christmas party.
In retrospect, I have no idea what I thought@my plan was going to accomplish.
I was...so foolish.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're a complete moron. Just sit around and@mope about it for all I care.

group_1.textRight: Grrr...

group_1.textLeft: Rrrh...
...Look, I'm not doing this anymore.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't have to elaborate any futher@if you weren't so dumb.
But to put it simply, rationally speaking,@there's only one optimal solution left.

group_1.textRight: What a coincidence, I was just about@to say the same thing.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm? What's that?

group_1.textRight: ...We both need to attend the Christmas@party.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, you came up with the same solution?!
...Alright, say no more.
We'll go give Ui a quick apology,
and then we'll get a plan for the@Christmas party put together by dawn.

group_1.textRight: ...You're going to cooperate with me@on this?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Our intelligence combined should@formulate the best plan possible.
Together, I'm sure we can deduce the most@fun activities for Ui and the others.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...I suppose we can.
I see you're finally admitting that you@need my help.

group_1.textLeft: Don't let it get to your head!
I'm only doing this because Ui wants@all three of us at this party!

group_1.textRight: You don't have to be so obstinate.

group_1.textLeft: No, YOU don't have to be so–!
[chara:100702:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ugh, look, we don't have time for this!
Let's hurry up and go apologize to her.

group_1.textRight: Erm, wait–! I'm not prepared for this...

group_1.textLeft: Sucks to be you, then!@All I have to do is drop off this note!

group_1.textRight: What...? That's not an apology at all!
